name: UnMetal: Collector's Edition
storyline: You play as Jesse Fox who finds himself imprisoned in a covert military base where he was arrested for a crime he didn't commit. Jesse must now escape using his dry wits, quick words, improvised skills, an arsenal of warfare, violent explosives, MacGuyvered gadgets, and an elaborate explanation of how it all went down. If that all fails, he'll use his fists.
summary: The Collector’s Edition includes: Standard Edition (Switch or PS4) + User Manual, Physical OST, Dog-Tag Necklace (2 pieces), UnMetal Thermo-adhesive Patch Badge, Artbook, Postcard and Collector’s Box.
